    CouponType 
    CreditCurve
    Represent spreads relative to a reference yield curve against which securities are valued (yield = reference + spread + delta), where yield = yield from reference curve, spread = value from credit curve, and delta = security-specific adjustment.
    CreditCurve.CcRequiredTags 
    CreditCurve.Knot
    A Knot is a point that a derived curve must pass through (any interpolation is guaranteed to satisfy this condition).
